newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Hang Lung unit sets HK$4.8 bln loan.
newsitem.headline: Hang Lung unit sets HK$4.8 bln loan.

text.p: Hang Lung Treasury Ltd's HK$4.8 billion term loan facility is now in general syndication, bankers said.
They said the facility will be guaranteed by Hang Lung Development Co Ltd. It has a maturity of five years and pays a margin of 50 basis points over the Hong Kong Interbank Offered Rate.
Fees are 32.5 basis points for co-lead managers committing HK$150 million and 25 basis points for senior managers committing HK$75 million.

Arrangers are ABN Amro Bank, Bank of Tokyo-Mitsubishi, Banque Nationale de Paris, Bayerische Landesbank, Commerz East Asia Dai-ichi Kangyo Bank, Deutsche Bank, Fuji Bank, Sakura Bank, Societe Generale Asia, Sumitomo Bank, WestLB and BZW Asia.
